bookSourceComment:
本书源除了可以搜索豆瓣中日记类文章外，

还可通过发现，添加豆瓣用户发布的文章

规则如下

在发现地址规则(url)处添加发现规则：
小说名称::小说网站

eg.
一日囚::https://www.douban.com/note/662056085/
......

添加规则后可在发现处将书籍加入书架。

var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));

if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.ywpxg.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
//java.log(url)
result=url;</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}
//java.log("SSSS"+baseUrl)
result=getZipContent(baseUrl)
//java.log(result);

</js>$.data[*]

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

<js>
importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);
var J=JSON.parse(result).all_book_items;
J.map(o=>({
    name:o.name,
    author:o.author,
    tags:[o.category,o.status].join(','),
    latest: String(o.lastChapterName).replace(/[\(（].*[求更谢乐发推].*[）\)]/,''),
    intro:o.desc,
    cover:o.imgUrl,
    catalogUrl:'/api/bookapp/bookSummary.m?sort=1&size=2147483647&returnType=100&gsort=1&cid=eef_easou_book&os=android&appverion=1070&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&ptype=4&gid='+o.gid+'&nid='+o.nid
})).filter(v =>v.name);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category'),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
①可搜索文章名、作者名、主角配角名和其它关键字里包含该关键字的文章，搜索结果按作品收藏数排序，不局限于书名或作者
②发现的标签均为言情，且标签很多，可自行增删改，只要链接是晋江网页版的就行
③搜索和发现里显示的书籍封面为晋江默认封面，所以封面地址都删了，只留了详情页的正确封面
④详情页没有灌溉和霸王票排名，需要的可根据关耳小姐姐的源加上
⑤正文默认替换作话的感谢投食
⑥本书源基于2.23源仓库用户Ｏ。分享的书源“晋江文学”，根据酷安@关耳010225和@乃星的3.1更新的书源美化
    by viviyaaa
bookSourceUrl: 强迫症专用，记得看注释

<js>
//DES加密开始
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DES加密结束

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    pageSize:100,
    pageNum:parseInt(java.get('page'))
};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){
data.categoryId=baseUrl.match(/categoryId=(\d+)/)[1];
url=getPostUrl(data,'qryCategoryResList')
}else{
data.content=String(java.get('key'));
url=getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
}

java.ajax(url)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

}
list;
</js>
